original_text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.
korean_text: 아르왓 족속과 스말 족속과 하맛 족속을 낳았더니 이 후로 가나안 자손의 족속이 흩어져 나아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아르밧 사람과, 스말 사람과, 하맛 사람이 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.
